index.title: Welcome
index.description: This project was created so that we can have a true open web in which we can start back from web 1.0 and build what should have been, but never happened. While this idea as a whole takes on many names, we can all agree that it should be about openness and freedom.

intro/about.title: What is Lume?
intro/about.description: What is Lume? This is something we have often asked ourselves to explain it ðŸ˜….

intro/history.title: History
intro/history.description: Lume started (before we even decided it was a project or the name) while we were trying to create a web3 cloud drive on Nextcloud based on Skynet. We realized that we were going down the wrong path and needed to solve accessing content before doing anything with the content itself.

problems/web2-limits.title: Limitations of Web2
problems/web2-limits.description: Currently, Web2 is a combination of multiple open protocols.

problems/web3-building-blocks.title: Building Blocks of Web3
problems/web3-building-blocks.description: If you hear someone talk about Web3 today, all they are talking about are just random NFT's, Casinos or future possibilities of internet.
